com.revature.banking.dao

Interface BankAccountDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BankAccountDaoPostgres

    public interface BankAccountDao
    Interface for interacting with data. This is intended to be used by the service layer.
    Author:
    Jared F Bennatt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BANK_ACCOUNT_NO_LENGTH 
      static double MAX_DEPOSIT 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addUserToAccount(int userKey, EncryptedBankAccount eba)
      Adds a user to an account.
      boolean createNewAccount(EncryptedBankAccount eba)
      This adds the passed bank account to the database.

      Deletes this bank account from the database.

    • Field Detail

      • BANK_ACCOUNT_NO_LENGTH

        static final int BANK_ACCOUNT_NO_LENGTH
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        static final double MAX_DEPOSIT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • createNewAccount

        boolean createNewAccount(EncryptedBankAccount eba)
        This adds the passed bank account to the database.
        Parameters:
        eba - Bank account to be added. This method should set eba's account_key.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this action was successful.

      • getAllAccounts

        java.util.Set<EncryptedBankAccount> getAllAccounts()
        Gets all of the accounts in the database.
        Returns:
        A Set of EncryptedBankAccount objects representing all present in the database.

      • addUserToAccount

        boolean addUserToAccount(int userKey,
                         EncryptedBankAccount eba)
        Adds a user to an account.
        Parameters:
        eUser - User to add an account to. The passed user must contain a valid user_key.
        eba - The bank account to link to this user. The passed account must contain a valid account_id.

      • removeUserFromAccount

        boolean removeUserFromAccount(EncryptedUser eUser,
                              EncryptedBankAccount eba)
        Removes this user from an account.
        Parameters:
        eUser - User to be removed (must have user_key set).
        eba - Bank account to be remove from (must have account_key set).
        Returns:
        whether or not this action was successful.

      • deleteAccount

        boolean deleteAccount(EncryptedBankAccount eba)
        Deletes this bank account from the database. There are no checks to make sure that this account isn't linked to someone else (or does any de-linking whatsoever).
        Parameters:
        eba - Bank account to be deleted. This must include, at least the account_key.

      • getAccountsByUserKey

        java.util.List<EncryptedBankAccount> getAccountsByUserKey(int userKey)
        Returns the accounts associated with this user account based on the user's key.
        Parameters:
        userKey - user_key from the User stored in the database.
        Returns:
        A list of encrypted bank accounts from database.

      • updateAccount

        boolean updateAccount(EncryptedBankAccount eba)
        Updates the account given.
        Parameters:
        eba - The account to updated (the balance and account_no will be overrided). It is assumed that the account_no does not actually change, only the encrypted value.
        Returns:
        Whether or not this operation was successful.
